multiple-choice.question: Consider a bitstring of length 5, in which each bit is 0 with probability 1/2 (and, thus, 1 with probability 1/2), independently of the other bits. Define the random variables $X$ and $Y$ as follows: [defs] X = the number of 0s in this bitstring [/defs] and [defs] Y = the value of the first bit in this bitstring. [/defs] Which of the following is true?
multiple-choice.answer: The random variables $X$ and $Y$ are independent.
The random variables $X$ and $Y$ are not independent.
